name: MakeMeSmile
0:
”Alexa, open make me smile”
”play make me smile”
”inspire me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: make me smile
des:
One single smile brings many benefits and can change the way we experience our lives! Start your day with a smile. :)

Enable this skill and then, Invoke by saying "make me smile" or "play make me smile". 

A laugh a day keeps the doctor away! So let's dive into the benefits of smiling and keep smiling.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
